text: mariyu satyatiraskarulaina varu ila antaru: "Memu i khur'an nu mariyu diniki mundu vaccina e granthanni kuda nam'mamu." Okavela i durmargulanu tama prabhuvu eduta nilabettabadinappudu, varu okari nokaru, aropanalu cesukovatam nivu custe (enta bagundunu)! Balahina vargam varu durahankarulaina tama nayakulato: "Mire lekunte memu tappaka visvasula mayyevaram!" Ani antaru
